this game is great, except the russians in it

In spite of the challenges, this game is still at the top of my favorites list. It demands cooperation and strategy in order to succeed, and having a designated group of people is a must. However, the game is fairly balanced and doesn't often disappoint in terms of quality, intensity, and, most important, fun. Sure, every now and then you experience hackers and trolls or enemies who use some OP weapons, but it manages to pull me back in every time.
It's a very fun and competitive game to play to test your true skill of aiming, tactical strategies, callouts, and teamwork.
I have played over 6k and this game is fun sometimes but when u try to play good it sucks!
Is very fun, also good competitive play, can be a bit toxic at times though

Arguably one of if not the best game for the price on steam. I would recommend this game for experienced or beginner PC players.

---- A Silver's Opinion ---
If you are started with silver, you need to know 1 thing: You can not rankup!!!
With hackers and smurf accounts they won't let you to rank up o_o

But even though you can not rankup its a very fun game (but sometimes it gaves me a hearth attack :/ )

Pros:
- Very realistic gun sprays
- Tense game play
- Skins XD
- Map designs
Cons:
- Hackers (VAC Sucks)
- Toxic Kids
- Gives you brain tumor

However overall i give this game a 7/10 :D
